item.description: Wood-elven Cleric of the Raven Queen ![[Pasted image 20221209174702.png]] Important Relations Adventuring with [[Asurak]], [[Avaaros Wolfwalker]], [[Davelor]], [[Reznak]], [[Ruby]], [[Runa]], and [[Tia Thunderstep]] and, newly also [[Sealion]] Cleric of the [[Raven Queen]]
